text: Mathieu Simon Laurent (born 28 February 1996) is a Canadian professional soccer player who plays as a defender for USL Championship club Birmingham Legion.https://www.uslchampionship.com/mathieu- laurenthttps://www.bhmlegion.com/news_article/show/988447 ==References== ==External links== *USL bio *Profile at UAB Sports Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Birmingham Legion FC players Category:Canadian soccer players Category:Canadian expatriate soccer players Category:K-W United FC players Category:Soccer people from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Markham, Ontario Category:UAB Blazers men's soccer players Category:USL Championship players Category:USL League Two players
title: Mathieu Laurent
